name: Avalanche
desc: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.

name: Global Silence
desc: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

name: Chakra Magic
desc: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.

name: Ice Path
desc: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

name: Ice Vortex
desc: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.

name: Phantom Strike
desc: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

name: Unstable Current
desc: Razor moves with increased speed, and hits a random nearby unit with a jolt of electricity every 5 seconds. The jolt deals damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Silence
desc: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

name: Rot
desc: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

name: Ink Swell
desc: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After 3 seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how much ink tendril damage was inflicted to heroes.
